docs.lead_paragraph: Drugmakers said on Monday they would continue to ship medicines to Greece in coming weeks, despite mounting unpaid bills, but warned supplies could be in jeopardy if Europe did not take emergency action.

headline.main: Drugmakers Warn Greek Medicine Supply 'May Be in Jeopardy'
headline.print_headline: Drugmakers Warn Greek Medicine Supply 'May Be in Jeopardy'

docs.snippet: Drugmakers said on Monday they would continue to ship medicines to Greece in coming weeks, despite mounting unpaid bills, but warned supplies could be in jeopardy if Europe did not take emergency action.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court is meeting for the final time until the fall to decide three remaining cases and add some new ones for the term that starts in October.

headline.main: Decisions in Last 3 Supreme Court Cases Expected Monday
headline.print_headline: Decisions in Last 3 Supreme Court Cases Expected Monday

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court is meeting for the final time until the fall to decide three remaining cases and add some new ones for the term that starts in October.
